message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for your business. Let me know what you think.

Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the price of $1,200,000. I am willing to pay up to $950,000 for the product. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but it's still a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. This is a substantial discount from my original offer, and I believe it's a fair price that reflects the value of the product.  Let's try to close this deal.

Alice, I understand your position, but unfortunately, my budget is still not able to accommodate $1,050,000. I am willing to pay up to $1,000,000 for the product. I hope this revised offer is closer to what you're looking for.

Bob, I'm going to be upfront - $1,000,000 isn't quite meeting my needs. However, I value our potential partnership and want to make this work. I'm willing to reduce my price to $1,025,000.  This is a significant compromise, and I believe it's a fair offer considering the product's value. Let's see if we can close this deal.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. While I understand your position, I am still constrained by my budget. I am willing to pay up to $1,000,000 for the product. I hope this revised offer meets your needs and allows us to move forward.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still not able to go any lower than $1,010,000. This is a very slight adjustment from my last offer, and I believe it's a fair price considering the value of the product. If you're serious about making this deal happen, I'm hopeful you can see your way to accepting this offer. Let's make this happen.

Alice, I've done my best to accommodate your needs while staying within my budget constraints. I am willing to pay up to $1,000,000 for the product. I hope this revised offer is acceptable and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
